channel.title: What Client to download for model making?
channel.description: Hello everybody, I was about to add models to my client and I went to search for the models folder but there wasn't one so I'm going to download a new Client, does anyone know a client that has a models folder?

item.title: What Client to download for model making?
item.dc:creator: @nardoscape nardoscape
item.description:
@nardoscape wrote:

Most Clients do have a models folder if they dont just make one.

Read full topic
item.source: What Client to download for model making?
